data.actual_result: You are redirected to the old Developer Portal
data.expected_result: You should be redirected to the new Developer Portal
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Clicking the Developer links at the bottom of  or on the Rich Presence page redirects to the old Developer Portal
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to discordapp(dot)com - Scroll to the bottom - Click a link to the Developer Portal - Alternatively: Go to the Rich Presence page and click Get Started
